jhave.core
Class Visualizer

java.lang.Object
  jhave.core.Visualizer

public abstract class Visualizer
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for all visualizer implementations.

Author:
Chris Gaffney

Field Summary
static int CAP_ANIMATED
          The visualizer is animated, default is slide show style.
static int CAP_CONTROLLABLE
          The visualizer is controllable.
static int CAP_FINISH
          Visualizer supports finishing/grading.
static int CAP_GOTO_FRAME
          Visualizer supports going directly to a specified frame.
static int CAP_MODEL
          Visualizer supports toggling model answer / student answer.
static int CAP_PAUSE
          Visualizer supports pausing play.
static int CAP_PLAY
          The visualizer supports playing frames / key frames in succession.
static int CAP_STEP_BACKWARD
          The visualizer supports stepping backward.
static int CAP_STEP_FORWARD
          The visualizer supports stepping forward.
static int CAP_STOP
          Visualizer supports stopping play.
static int CAP_ZOOM
          Visualizer supports zooming.

CAP_STOP

public static final int CAP_STOP
Visualizer supports stopping play. Not available if play is not supported.

Constant Field Values

Visualizer

public Visualizer(java.io.InputStream script)
           throws java.io.IOException
Creates a new instance of Visualizer

Parameters:
script - the InputStream that will contain the script to be read.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - an error occurs while reading from the InputStream.

Returns the Visualizers rendering pane.

public void addQuestionListener(QuestionListener listener)
Register a QuestionListener with this visualizer.

Parameters:

Unregister a QuestionListener with this visualizer.

listener - the QuestionListener to unregister.

fireQuestionEvent

Fire a QuestionEvent to all registered listeners.

Parameters:

                                      int type)
Fire a DocumentEvent to all registered DocumentationListeners.

Parameters:
document - the URL of the document.
type - the type of the document as defined in the DocumentEvent class.

fireAudioTextEvent

protected void fireAudioTextEvent(java.lang.String the_text)
Fire a AudioTextEvent to all registered AudioTextListeners.

Parameters:
document - the URL of the document.
the_text - the text of the event as defined in the AudioTextEvent class.

getCapabilities

public int getCapabilities()
Returns the capabilities of the visualizer.

Returns:
mask of the capabilities as defined by the CAP_* constants.

setCapabilities

protected void setCapabilities(int capabilities)
Sets the capabilities of the visualizer.

Parameters:
capabilities - the mask of the capabilities.

getFrameCount

public abstract int getFrameCount()
Returns the total number of frames / key frames.

Returns:
the total number of frames / key frames.

getCurrentFrame

public abstract int getCurrentFrame()
Returns the current frame, must be zero (0) based.

Returns:
the current frame / key frame.

gotoFrame

public void gotoFrame(int frame)
Go directly to the given frame, do not animate to it. This method should not block.

Parameters:
frame - the frame / key frame number to go to, zero based.

stepBackward

public void stepBackward()
Step back one frame, animating if necessary. This method must block until the animation or frame change is complete.

stepForward

public void stepForward()
Step forward one frame, animating if necessary. This method must block until the animation or frame change is complete.

play

public void play()
Play several frames in succession. This method must block until it reaches the end of the script or pause / stop are called. If pause or stop is called then play should stop play immediatlly if possible and unblock / return.

pause

public void pause()
Pause the visualization at the current frame. This method should make a call to play unblock immeditatlly if possible.

stop

public void stop()
Stops a visualizer from playing and returns to the first frame.

zoom

public void zoom(double level)
Set the zoom of the visualizer to the specified level. The parameter is a percentage with 1.0 being 100% or default zoom.

Parameters:
level - zoom percentage.

getZoom

public double getZoom()
Returns the current zoom level.

Returns:
current zoom level.

toggleModelAnswerVisible

public void toggleModelAnswerVisible()

finish

public int[] finish()
